name: Spike Valentino Buttery Matte Lipstick
about: What it is: A buttery matte lip color with 10H comfort in a non-drying finish. One stroke, instant color for a bold or blurred finish..Formulation Type: Lipstick..Benefits: Long-wearing.Highlighted Ingredients: - Cotton Oil Extract: Moisturizing formula that keeps lips looking hydrated and smooth..- Roma-Light Complex: Infused with light to add dimension and intensity of each color..- 12% Pigment Concentration: 10H stay-true color after one stroke...What Else You Need to Know: Spike Valentino is infused with light-diffusing gel and cotton oil extract with a buttery matte finish to keep lips looking hydrated. Enriched with our unique Roma-Light ComplexTM to add dimension and intensity of each color. Discover nudes and pops of color with couture-inspired shade names.
ingredients: -Cotton Oil Extract: Moisturizing formula that keeps lips looking hydrated and smooth..-Roma-Light Complex: Infused with light to add dimension and intensity of each color..-12% Pigment Concentration: 10 Hour stay-true color that pops on all skin tones...Dimethicone, Isohexadecane, Bis-Diglyceryl Polyacyladipate-2, Ci 77891 / Titanium Dioxide, Hydrogenated Jojoba Oil, Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Tridecyl Trimellitate, Paraffin, Lauroyl Lysine, Trimethylsiloxyphenyl Dimethicone, Mica, Kaolin, Cera Microcristallina / Microcrystalline Wax / Cire Microcristalline, Isostearyl Isostearate, Ci 77492 / Iron Oxides, Glass Beads, Ci 77491 / Iron Oxides, Polyethylene, Synthetic Wax, Ci 15850 / Red 7, Triethoxysilylethyl Polydimethylsiloxyethyl Dimethicone, Isopropyl Titanium Triisostearate, Ci 77499 / Iron Oxides, Alumina, Gossypium Herbaceum Seed Oil / Cotton Seed Oil, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Ci 15850 / Red 7 Lake, Citronellol, Citrus Aurantium Bergamia Fruit Oil / Bergamot Fruit Oil, Limonene, Geraniol, Linalool, Tin Oxide, Benzyl Alcohol, Colophonium / Rosin / Colophane, Tocopherol, Magnesium Silicate, Helianthus Annuus Seed Oil / Sunflower Seed Oil, Lecithin, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Parfum / Fragrance (F.I.L. T70039187/3).
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Apply using Valentino Beauty’s signature application gesture: start by creating a V-shape on the cupid bow then mark the center lower lip line and from the outer corner, draw into the center lower lip mark created, before repeating on the other side. .-True to Valentino Beauty’s sustainable mindset, Spike Valentino is refillable on a selection of shades and interchangeable. .-Unclick the refill from its base and click in a new color for a seamless transition.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The case is so cute, magnetic and heavy. It has a sweet, pleasant scent and super smooth texture. Application was smooth and the pigmentation was great. It is matte but not drying as some others can be.
